title: Behind the wardrobe doors: Secrets of the Queen's dresser
text:
In her book, Angela Kelly shares the stories of her life with Her Majesty

She is the Liverpudlian docker’s daughter who has grown so close to the Queen, the 93-year-old monarch once remarked: “We could be sisters”.

As the curator and designer of the Queen’s wardrobe, Angela Kelly is now publishing a book laying bare her extraordinary affinity with Her Majesty and it promises to provide a unique insight into their “true and lasting connection”.

By chronicling a 25 year working relationship “characterised by humour, creativity, hard work and a mutual commitment to service and duty”, The Other Side of the Coin, published on Tuesday, is unprecedented in its candour about one of the world’s most...
description: In her book, Angela Kelly shares the stories of her life with Her Majesty
